project.description: Deploy the application, with latest ":stage" container builds, on the Staging cluster.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: curl -X DELETE http://master0:8080/v2/groups/azure?force=true wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rgardler/AzureDevTestDeploy/master/marathon/marathon.json curl -X POST http://master0:8080/v2/groups -d @marathon.json -H "Content-type:application/json"
